price: Isipo kuwa Mtume wake aliye mridhia. Naye huyo humwekea walinzi mbele yake na nyuma yake.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا
footnotes: ila Mtume aliye mridhia kumjuvya baadhi ya hiyo siri. Naye humwekea mbele ya huyo Mtume na nyuma yake Malaika wa kumkinga na wasiwasi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā mani ir'taḍā min rasūlin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi raṣadan
